step.title: Register to Red Hat Network
step.para: Run the rhn_register command to register the system with the Red Hat Network. To complete registration successfully you will need to supply your Red Hat Network username and password. Follow the onscreen prompts to complete registration of the system.

step.title: Subscribe to Required Channels
step.para: You must subscribe the system to the required channels using either the Red Hat Network web interface or the command line rhn-channel command.

step.title: Using the Red Hat Network Web Interface
step.para: To add a channel subscription to a system from the web interface:
Log on to Red Hat Network ().
Click Systems at the top of the page.
Select the system to which you are adding channels from the list presented on the screen, by clicking the name of the system.
Click Alter Channel Subscriptions in the Subscribed Channels section of the screen.
Select the channel to be added from the list presented on the screen, then click the Change Subscription button to finalize the change.
Repeat these steps for each additional channel the system is to be subscribed to.

important.title: Important â€” Troubleshooting rhn-channel Errors
important.para: If you are not the Red Hat Network administrator for the machine, or the machine is not registered to Red Hat Network, then use of the rhn-channel command will result in an error:
important.screen: Error communicating with server. The message was: Error Class Code: 37 Error Class Info: You are not allowed to perform administrative tasks on this system. Explanation: An error has occurred while processing your request. If this problem persists please enter a bug report at bugzilla.redhat.com. If you choose to submit the bug report, please be sure to include details of what you were trying to do when this error occurred and details on how to reproduce this problem.
important.para: If you encounter this error when using rhn-channel then to add the Red Hat Network channel to the system you must use the web user interface.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The system is now registered with Red Hat Network and subscribed to the channels required for Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager installation.
The system is now configured and you are ready to install the packages required for oVirt Engine installation.
